description: Mapping from dataset activities to Atlas v3 motion-based atomic motions
note: Static activities (sitting/lying/standing) share 'stationary' atomic motion - cannot be distinguished in zero-shot

openpack.note: Industrial packaging operations - wrist/forearm sensors only

lara.note: Logistic warehouse activities - 8 classes with semantic attributes

tmd.note: Transportation mode detection - 5 modes (Walking, Car, Still, Train, Bus)
